title: Grand Canyon National Park: 2003-2006 Releases
body: 2003-2006 News Release Archive       These are the news releases from the years 2003 - 2006. These are historic news releases. The links and contact information contained within may now be outdated and may no longer be valid.  Grand Canyon National Park news releases from the year 2003 - 2006 are available as news digests in the the Adobe PDF file format. To download a news digest, click on the year. 2006 News Digest (1.06MB PDF File) Digest file includes all news releases issued by the park in 2006.  2005 News Digest (1.13MB PDF File) Digest file includes all news releases issued by the park in 2005.  2004 News Digest (2.30MB PDF File) Digest file includes all news releases issued by the park in 2004.  2003 News Digest (1.65MB PDF File) Digest file includes all news releases issued by the park in 2003.
